documents.t: Are the given dates equal? let isEqual: (Js.Date.t, Js.Date.t) => bool Copy let fstDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ())let sndDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ())fstDate->ReDate.isEqual(sndDate) Copy

Is the first date before the second one? let isBefore: (Js.Date.t, Js.Date.t) => bool Copy let fstDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ())let sndDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=2., ())fstDate->ReDate.isBefore(sndDate) Copy

Is the first date after the second one? let isAfter: (Js.Date.t, Js.Date.t) => bool Copy let fstDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=2., ())let sndDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ())fstDate->ReDate.isAfter(sndDate) Copy
Is the given date in the future? let isFuture: Js.Date.t => bool Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2030., ~month=0., ~date=1., ())date->ReDate.isFuture Copy
Is the given date in the past? let isPast: Js.Date.t => bool Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=1999., ~month=0., ~date=1., ())date->ReDate.isPast Copy

Compare the two dates and return 1 if the first date is after the second, -1 if the first date is before the second or 0 if dates are equal. let compareAsc: (Js.Date.t, Js.Date.t) => int Copy let a = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=1999., ~month=0., ~date=1., ())let b = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2017., ~month=2., ~date=1., ())let c = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2017., ~month=4., ~date=1., ())let d = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=12., ~date=1., ())let unsortedArray = [d, b, c, a]Belt.SortArray.stableSortBy(unsortedArray, ReDate.compareAsc) Copy

Compare the two dates and return -1 if the first date is after the second, 1 if the first date is before the second or 0 if dates are equal. let compareDesc: (Js.Date.t, Js.Date.t) => int Copy let a = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=1999., ~month=0., ~date=1., ())let b = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2017., ~month=2., ~date=1., ())let c = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2017., ~month=4., ~date=1., ())let d = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=12., ~date=1., ())let unsortedArray = [a, b, d, c]Belt.SortArray.stableSortBy(unsortedArray, ReDate.compareDesc) Copy

Return the latest of the given dates. let max: array<Js.Date.t> => Js.Date.t Copy let a = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=1999., ~month=0., ~date=1., ())let b = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2017., ~month=2., ~date=1., ())let c = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2017., ~month=4., ~date=1., ())let d = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=12., ~date=1., ())let dates = [b, c, d, a]dates->ReDate.max Copy

Return the earliest of the given dates. let min: array<Js.Date.t> => Js.Date.t Copy let a = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=1999., ~month=0., ~date=1., ())let b = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2017., ~month=2., ~date=1., ())let c = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2017., ~month=4., ~date=1., ())let d = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=12., ~date=1., ())let dates = [b, c, d, a]dates->ReDate.min Copy

Is the given date valid? let isValid: (~year: float, ~month: float, ~date: float, ~hours: float=?, ~minutes: float=?, ~seconds: float=?, unit) => bool Copy ReDate.isValid(~year=1999., ~month=1., ~date=29., ()) Copy

Return a date from the array closest to the given date. let closestTo: (Js.Date.t, array<Js.Date.t>) => option<Js.Date.t> Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ())let a = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=1999., ~month=0., ~date=1., ())let b = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=2., ~date=1., ())let c = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2020., ~month=4., ~date=1., ())let d = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2022., ~month=12., ~date=1., ())let dates = [a, b, c, d]date->ReDate.closestTo(dates) Copy

Add the specified number of minutes to the given date. let addMinutes: (Js.Date.t, float) => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ~hours=19., ~minutes=30., ~seconds=30., ())date->ReDate.addMinutes(1) Copy

Subtract the specified number of minutes from the given date. let subMinutes: (Js.Date.t, float) => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ~hours=19., ~minutes=30., ~seconds=30., ())date->ReDate.subMinutes(1) Copy

Get the minutes of the given date. let getMinutes: Js.Date.t => float Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ~hours=19., ~minutes=30., ~seconds=30., ());date->ReDate.getMinutes Copy

Set the minutes to the given date. let setMinutes: (Js.Date.t, float) => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ~hours=19., ~minutes=30., ~seconds=0., ());date->ReDate.setMinutes(30.) Copy

Get the number of minutes between the given dates. let differenceInMinutes: (Js.Date.t, Js.Date.t) => float Copy let fstDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ~hours=19., ~minutes=40., ~seconds=15., ())let sndDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ~hours=19., ~minutes=30., ~seconds=0., ())fstDate->ReDate.differenceInMinutes(sndDate) Copy

Return the start of a minute for the given date. let startOfMinute: Js.Date.t => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=8., ~date=10., ~hours=8., ~minutes=20., ~seconds=35., ())date->ReDate.startOfMinute Copy

Return the end of a minute for the given date. let endOfMinute: Js.Date.t => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=8., ~date=10., ~hours=8., ~minutes=20., ~seconds=35., ())date->ReDate.endOfMinute Copy

Are the given dates in the same minute? let isSameMinute: (Js.Date.t, Js.Date.t) => bool Copy let fstDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=8., ~date=10., ~hours=19., ~minutes=6., ~seconds=10., ())let sndDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=8., ~date=10., ~hours=19., ~minutes=6., ~seconds=35., ())fstDate->ReDate.isSameMinute(sndDate) Copy

Rounds the given date to the nearest minute. let roundToNearestMinute: (~nearestTo: float=?, Js.Date.t) => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=8., ~date=10., ~hours=19., ~minutes=6., ~seconds=31., ())date->ReDate.roundToNearestMinute Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=8., ~date=10., ~hours=19., ~minutes=12., ~seconds=10., ())let roundToNearest15Minute = ReDate.roundToNearestMinute(~nearestTo=15.)date->roundToNearest15Minute Copy

Return the end of a week for the given date. let endOfISOWeek: Js.Date.t => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=10., ~hours=16., ~minutes=50., ~seconds=12., ())date->ReDate.endOfISOWeek Copy

Get the ISO week of the given date. let getISOWeek: Js.Date.t => float Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2005., ~month=0., ~date=2., ~hours=16., ~minutes=50., ~seconds=12., ())date->ReDate.getISOWeek Copy

Are the given dates in the same ISO week? let isSameISOWeek: (Js.Date.t, Js.Date.t) => bool Copy let fstDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2005., ~month=11., ~date=31., ~hours=16., ~minutes=50., ~seconds=12., ())let sndDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2006., ~month=0., ~date=1., ~hours=10., ~minutes=15., ~seconds=55., ())fstDate->ReDate.isSameISOWeek(sndDate) Copy

Is the given date in the same ISO week as the current date? let isThisISOWeek: Js.Date.t => bool Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=12., ~hours=16., ~minutes=50., ~seconds=12., ())date->ReDate.isThisISOWeek Copy

Return the last day of an ISO week for the given date. The result will be in the local timezone. let lastDayOfISOWeek: Js.Date.t => bool Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2014., ~month=8., ~date=2., ~hours=11., ~minutes=55., ~seconds=12., ())date->ReDate.lastDayOfISOWeek Copy

Set the ISO week for the given date, preserving the weekday number. A new date will be returned, the original date will not be changed. let setISOWeek: (Js.Date.t, float) => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2004., ~month=7., ~date=7., ())date->ReDate.setISOWeek(53.) Copy

Return the start of an ISO week for the given date. The result will be in the local timezone. let startOfISOWeek: Js.Date.t => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2014., ~month=8., ~date=2., ~hours=11., ~minutes=55., ~seconds=0., ())date->ReDate.startOfISOWeek Copy

Get the number of calendar ISO weeks between the given dates. let differenceInCalendarISOWeeks: (Js.Date.t, Js.Date.t) => int Copy let fstDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2014., ~month=6., ~date=21., ~hours=23., ~minutes=59., ~seconds=59., ())let sndDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2014., ~month=6., ~date=6., ~hours=0., ~minutes=0., ~seconds=0., ())fstDate->ReDate.differenceInCalendarISOWeeks(sndDate) Copy
Add the specified number of days to the given date. let addDays: (Js.Date.t, float) => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ())date->ReDate.addDays(5.) Copy

Add the specified number of business days to the given date (excluding weekends). let addBusinessDays: (Js.Date.t, float) => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ())date->ReDate.addBusinessDays(5.) Copy

Subtract the specified number of days from the given date. let subDays: (Js.Date.t, float) => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ())date->ReDate.subDays(5.) Copy
Get the day of the month of the given date. let getDate: Js.Date.t => float Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ())date->ReDate.getDate Copy
Set the day of the month to the given date. let setDate: (Js.Date.t, float) => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ())date->ReDate.setDate(23.) Copy

Return the start of a day for the given date. let startOfDay: Js.Date.t => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ~hours=16., ~minutes=50., ~seconds=12., ())date->ReDate.startOfDay Copy

Return the end of a day for the given date. let endOfDay: Js.Date.t => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ~hours=16., ~minutes=50., ~seconds=12., ())date->ReDate.endOfDay Copy

Get the number of calendar days between the given dates. This means that the times are removed from the dates and then the difference in days is calculated. let differenceInCalendarDays: (Js.Date.t, Js.Date.t) => float Copy let fstDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2019., ~month=0., ~date=1., ())let sndDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ())fstDate->ReDate.differenceInCalendarDays(sndDate) Copy

Get the number of full day periods between the given dates. let differenceInDays: (Js.Date.t, Js.Date.t) => float Copy let fstDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=10., ~hours=10., ~minutes=15., ~seconds=55., ())let sndDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=2., ~hours=20., ~minutes=50., ~seconds=10., ())fstDate->ReDate.differenceInDays(sndDate) Copy

Get the number of full day periods between the given dates. let differenceInBusinessDays: (Js.Date.t, Js.Date.t) => float Copy let fstDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=10., ())let sndDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=2., ())fstDate->ReDate.differenceInBusinessDays(sndDate) Copy
Get the day of the year of the given date. let getDayOfYear: Js.Date.t => float Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=7., ~date=23., ())date->ReDate.getDayOfYear Copy

Are the given dates in the same day? let isSameDay: (Js.Date.t, Js.Date.t) => bool Copy let fstDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ~hours=16., ~minutes=50., ~seconds=12., ())let sndDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ~hours=10., ~minutes=15., ~seconds=55., ())fstDate->ReDate.isSameDay(sndDate) Copy
Is the given date today? let isToday: Js.Date.t => bool Copy let date = Js.Date.make()date->ReDate.isToday Copy
Is the given date tomorrow? let isTomorrow: Js.Date.t => bool Copy let date = Js.Date.make()date->ReDate.addDays(.1)->ReDate.isTomorrow Copy
Is the given date yesterday? let isYesterday: Js.Date.t => bool Copy let date = Js.Date.make()date->ReDate.subDays(1.)->ReDate.isYesterday Copy

Get the ISO week-numbering year of the given date, which always starts 3 days before the year's first Thursday. let getISOWeekYear: Js.Date.t => float Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=12., ~hours=16., ~minutes=50., ~seconds=12., ())date->ReDate.getISOWeekYear Copy

Return the start of an ISO week-numbering year, which always starts 3 days before the year's first Thursday. The result will be in the local timezone. let startOfISOWeekYear: Js.Date.t => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=12., ~hours=16., ~minutes=50., ~seconds=12., ())date->ReDate.startOfISOWeekYear Copy

Add the specified number of hours to the given date. let addHours: (Js.Date.t, float) => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ~hours=19., ~minutes=30., ~seconds=0., ());date->ReDate.addHours(1.); Copy

Subtract the specified number of hours from the given date. let subHours: (Js.Date.t, float) => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ~hours=19., ~minutes=30., ~seconds=0., ());date->ReDate.subHours(1.); Copy

Get the hours of the given date. let getHours: Js.Date.t => float Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ~hours=19., ~minutes=30., ~seconds=30., ());date->ReDate.getHours Copy

Set the hours to the given date. let setHours: (Js.Date.t, float) => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ~hours=19., ~minutes=30., ~seconds=0., ());date->ReDate.setHours(18.) Copy

Get the number of hours between the given dates. let differenceInHours: (Js.Date.t, Js.Date.t) => float Copy let fstDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ~hours=19., ~minutes=40., ~seconds=15., ());let sndDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ~hours=10., ~minutes=30., ~seconds=0., ());fstDate->ReDate.differenceInHours(sndDate); Copy

Return the start of an hour for the given date. let startOfHour: Js.Date.t => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ~hours=16., ~minutes=50., ~seconds=10., ());date->ReDate.startOfHour; Copy

Return the end of an hour for the given date. let endOfHour: Js.Date.t => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ~hours=16., ~minutes=50., ~seconds=10., ());date->ReDate.endOfHour; Copy

Are the given dates in the same hour? let isSameHour: (Js.Date.t, Js.Date.t) => bool Copy let fstDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ~hours=16., ~minutes=50., ~seconds=10., ());let sndDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ~hours=16., ~minutes=0., ~seconds=0., ());fstDate->ReDate.isSameHour(sndDate); Copy

Add the specified number of week to the given date. let addWeeks: (Js.Date.t, float) => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ())date->ReDate.addWeeks(1.) Copy

Subtract the specified number of weeks from the given date. let subWeeks: (Js.Date.t, float) => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=8., ())date->ReDate.subWeeks(1.) Copy

Get the number of full weeks between the given dates. let differenceInWeeks: (Js.Date.t, Js.Date.t) => float Copy let fstDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=7., ~hours=23., ~minutes=59., ~seconds=59., ())let sndDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ~hours=0., ~minutes=0., ~seconds=0., ())fstDate->ReDate.differenceInWeeks(sndDate) Copy

Get the number of calendar weeks between the given dates. let differenceInCalendarWeeks: (~weekStartsOn: day=?, Js.Date.t, Js.Date.t) => float Copy let fstDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=8., ~date=20., ())let sndDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=7., ~date=7., ())fstDate->ReDate.differenceInCalendarWeeks(sndDate) Copy let fstDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=6., ~date=15., ())let sndDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=5., ~date=20., ())let differenceInCalendarWeeks = ReDate.differenceInCalendarWeeks(~weekStartsOn=Monday)fstDate->differenceInCalendarWeeks(sndDate) Copy

Return the start of a week for the given date. let startOfWeek: (~weekStartsOn: day=?, Js.Date.t) => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=12., ~hours=16., ~minutes=50., ~seconds=12., ())date->ReDate.startOfWeek Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=12., ~hours=16., ~minutes=50., ~seconds=12., ())let startOfWeek = ReDate.startOfWeek(~weekStartsOn=Monday)date->startOfWeek Copy

Return the end of a week for the given date. let endOfWeek: (~weekStartsOn: day=?, Js.Date.t) => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=12., ~hours=16., ~minutes=50., ~seconds=12., ())date->ReDate.endOfWeek Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=12., ~hours=16., ~minutes=50., ~seconds=12., ())let endOfWeek = ReDate.endOfWeek(~weekStartsOn=Monday)date->endOfWeek Copy

Are the given dates in the same week? let isSameWeek: (~weekStartsOn: day=?, Js.Date.t, Js.Date.t) => bool Copy let fstDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ~hours=16., ~minutes=50., ~seconds=12., ())let sndDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=5., ~hours=10., ~minutes=15., ~seconds=55., ())fstDate->ReDate.isSameWeek(sndDate) Copy let fstDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=6., ~hours=23., ~minutes=59., ~seconds=59., ())let sndDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=7., ~hours=0., ~minutes=0., ~seconds=0., ())let isSameWeek = ReDate.isSameWeek(~weekStartsOn=Monday)fstDate->isSameWeek(sndDate) Copy

Return the last day of a week for the given date. let lastDayOfWeek: (~weekStartsOn: day=?, Js.Date.t) => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=12., ~hours=16., ~minutes=50., ~seconds=12., ())date->ReDate.lastDayOfWeek Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=12., ~hours=16., ~minutes=50., ~seconds=12., ())let lastDayOfWeek = ReDate.lastDayOfWeek(~weekStartsOn=Monday)date->lastDayOfWeek Copy

Get the week of the month of the given date. let getWeekOfMonth: (~weekStartsOn: day=?, Js.Date.t) => float Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ())date->ReDate.getWeekOfMonth Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=10., ~date=23., ())let getWeekOfMonth = ReDate.getWeekOfMonth(~weekStartsOn=Saturday)date->getWeekOfMonth Copy

Get the number of calendar weeks the month in the given date spans. let getWeeksInMonth: (~weekStartsOn: day=?, Js.Date.t) => float Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=10., ~date=1., ())date->ReDate.getWeeksInMonth Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=10., ~date=14., ())let getWeeksInMonth = ReDate.getWeeksInMonth(~weekStartsOn=Friday)date->getWeeksInMonth Copy

Get the local week index of the given date. let getWeek: (~weekStartsOn: day=?, Js.Date.t) => float Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=10., ~date=1., ())date->ReDate.getWeek Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=10., ~date=14., ())let getWeek = ReDate.getWeek(~weekStartsOn=Monday)date->getWeek Copy

Add the specified number of months to the given date. let addMonths: (Js.Date.t, float) => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ())date->ReDate.addMonths(1.) Copy

Subtract the specified number of months from the given date. let subMonths: (Js.Date.t, float) => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=1., ~date=1., ())date->ReDate.subMonths(1.) Copy
Get the month of the given date. let getMonth: Js.Date.t => float Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2019., ~month=4., ~date=1., ())date->ReDate.getMonth Copy
Set the month to the given date. let setMonth: (Js.Date.t, float) => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2019., ~month=4., ~date=1., ())date->ReDate.setMonth(5.) Copy

Get the number of calendar months between the given dates. let differenceInCalendarMonths: (Js.Date.t, Js.Date.t) => float Copy let fstDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2019., ~month=5., ~date=1., ())let sndDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=1., ~date=1., ())fstDate->ReDate.differenceInCalendarMonths(sndDate) Copy

Get the number of full months between the given dates. let differenceInMonths: (Js.Date.t, Js.Date.t) => float Copy let fstDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=7., ~date=1., ())let sndDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=6., ~date=31., ())fstDate->ReDate.differenceInMonths(sndDate) Copy

Return the start of a month for the given date. let startOfMonth: Js.Date.t => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=24., ~hours=16., ~minutes=50., ~seconds=12., ())date->ReDate.startOfMonth Copy

Return the end of a month for the given date. let endOfMonth: Js.Date.t => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=24., ~hours=16., ~minutes=50., ~seconds=12., ())date->ReDate.endOfMonth Copy
Is the given date the first day of a month? let isFirstDayOfMonth: Js.Date.t => bool Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ())date->ReDate.isFirstDayOfMonth Copy
Is the given date the last day of a month? let isLastDayOfMonth: Js.Date.t => bool Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=31., ())date->ReDate.isLastDayOfMonth Copy

Are the given dates in the same month? let isSameMonth: (Js.Date.t, Js.Date.t) => bool Copy let fstDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ())let sndDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=24., ())fstDate->ReDate.isSameMonth(sndDate) Copy

Return the last day of a month for the given date. let lastDayOfMonth: Js.Date.t => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=12., ())date->ReDate.lastDayOfMonth Copy
Get the number of days in a month of the given date. let getDaysInMonth: Js.Date.t => float Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=10., ~date=10., ())date->ReDate.getDaysInMonth Copy

Add the specified number of seconds to the given date. let addSeconds: (Js.Date.t, float) => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ~hours=19., ~minutes=30., ~seconds=0., ());date->ReDate.addSeconds(1.); Copy

Subtract the specified number of seconds from the given date. let subSeconds: (Js.Date.t, float) => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ~hours=19., ~minutes=30., ~seconds=0., ());date->ReDate.subSeconds(1.); Copy

Get the seconds of the given date. let getSeconds: Js.Date.t => float Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ~hours=19., ~minutes=30., ~seconds=30., ());date->ReDate.getSeconds Copy

Set the seconds to the given date. let setSeconds: (Js.Date.t, float) => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ~hours=19., ~minutes=30., ~seconds=0., ());date->ReDate.setSeconds(30.) Copy

Get the number of seconds between the given dates. let differenceInSeconds: (Js.Date.t, Js.Date.t) => float Copy let fstDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ~hours=19., ~minutes=40., ~seconds=15., ());let sndDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ~hours=19., ~minutes=30., ~seconds=0., ());fstDate->ReDate.differenceInSeconds(sndDate); Copy

Return the start of a second for the given date. let startOfSecond: Js.Date.t => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.setMilliseconds( Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ~hours=16., ~minutes=50., ~seconds=10., ()), 423., ) ->fromFloat;date->ReDate.startOfSecond; Copy

Return the end of a second for the given date. let endOfSecond: Js.Date.t => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.setMilliseconds( Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ~hours=16., ~minutes=50., ~seconds=10., ()), 423., ) ->fromFloat;date->ReDate.endOfSecond; Copy

Are the given dates in the same second? let isSameSecond: (Js.Date.t, Js.Date.t) => bool Copy let fstDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ~hours=23., ~minutes=59., ~seconds=59., ());let sndDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ~hours=23., ~minutes=59., ~seconds=58., ());fstDate->ReDate.isSameSecond(sndDate) Copy

Is the given date within the interval? let isWithinInterval: (Js.Date.t, interval) => bool Copy let interval = { start: Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=3., ~date=1., ()), end_: Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=4., ~date=10., ()),}let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=5., ())date->ReDate.isWithinInterval(interval) Copy

the given time interval overlapping with another time interval? let areIntervalsOverlapping: (interval, interval) => bool Copy let interval = { start: Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=3., ~date=1., ()), end_: Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=4., ~date=10., ()),}let includedInterval = { start: makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=3., ~date=5., ()), end_: makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=4., ~date=5., ()),}interval->ReDate.areIntervalsOverlapping(includedInterval) Copy

Get the number of days that overlap in two time intervals. let getOverlappingDaysInIntervals: (interval, interval) => float Copy let interval = { start: Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=3., ~date=1., ()), end_: Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=4., ~date=10., ()),}let includedInterval = { start: Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=3., ~date=5., ()), end_: Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=3., ~date=15., ()),}interval->ReDate.getOverlappingDaysInIntervals(includedInterval) Copy

Return the array of dates within the specified time interval. let eachDayOfInterval: interval => array<Js.Date.t> Copy let interval = { start: Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ~hours=19., ~minutes=30., ~seconds=22., ()), end_: Js.Date.makeWithYMDHMS(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=5., ~hours=8., ~minutes=45., ~seconds=15., ()),}interval->ReDate.eachDayOfInterval Copy

Get the local week-numbering year of the given date. let getWeekYear: (~weekStartsOn: day=?, Js.Date.t) => float Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=4., ~date=10., ())date->ReDate.getWeekYear Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=10., ~date=14., ())let getWeekYear = ReDate.getWeekYear(~weekStartsOn=Monday)date->getWeekYear Copy

Return the start of a local week-numbering year. let startOfWeekYear: (~weekStartsOn: day=?, Js.Date.t) => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=12., ())date->ReDate.startOfWeekYear Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=10., ~date=14., ())let startOfWeekYear = ReDate.startOfWeekYear(~weekStartsOn=Monday)date->startOfWeekYear Copy
Use a pipe-first (->) operator instead of deprecated pipe-forward (|>). Learn more: https://rescript-lang.org/docs/manual/v8.0.0/pipe#triangle-pipe-deprecated
Add @mobily/rescript-date to bs-dependencies in your bsconfig.json: { "bs-dependencies": [ "@mobily/rescript-date" ]} Copy

Is the day of the week of the given date same as the provided day? let isWeekDay: (Js.Date.t, day) => bool Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2021., ~month=11., ~date=10., ())date->ReDate.isWeekDay(ReDate.Friday) Copy

Add the specified number of years to the given date. let addYears: (Js.Date.t, float) => Js.Date.t Copy let date = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=4., ~date=1., ())date->ReDate.addYears(1.) Copy

Get the number of calendar years between the given dates. let differenceInCalendarYears: (Js.Date.t, Js.Date.t) => float Copy let fstDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2020., ~month=5., ~date=1., ())let sndDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=1., ~date=1., ())fstDate->ReDate.differenceInCalendarYears(sndDate) Copy

Get the number of full years between the given dates. let differenceInYears: (Js.Date.t, Js.Date.t) => float Copy let fstDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2018., ~month=0., ~date=1., ())let sndDate = Js.Date.makeWithYMD(~year=2016., ~month=0., ~date=1., ())fstDate->ReDate.differenceInYears(sndDate) Copy
